explains: n. 估计，估价；估价单；看法，判断
wordGroup: cost estimate 成本估算，成本估计
rough estimate 粗略的估计，粗算
conservative estimate 审慎估计，保守估计
best estimate 最佳估计；最佳推算数
point estimate [数]点估计；点估计值
unbiased estimate 不偏估计，公正（无偏）评价
final estimate 最终估计；结算
optimistic estimate 乐观估计；最乐观时间

sentences.en: My estimate was bang on target.

sentences.cn: 警方估计聚集的人有3万。

sentences.en: That estimate was right on the mark.
